<noinclude>{{note|This is a list of flags used by hitscan functions such as [[LineAttack (ZScript)|{{c|LineAttack()}}]]. It can be included into other pages with '''{{c|<nowiki>{{: LAF flags}}</nowiki>}}''' (this note will not be included)}}. </noinclude>:*{{c|'''LAF_ISMELEEATTACK'''}} — enables, but does not force, the puff to enter its Melee [[Actor states|state]] if it has it. :*{{c|'''LAF_NORANDOMPUFFZ'''}} — disables the random z offset given to the puff when spawned. :*{{c|'''LAF_NOIMPACTDECAL'''}} — disables the generation of [[decal]]s as a result of the attack. :*{{c|'''LAF_NOINTERACT'''}} — guarantees puff spawning and returns it directly to the calling function. Damage is not inflicted, sounds are not played, and blood splatters are not spawned. :*{{c|'''LAF_TARGETISSOURCE'''}} — the calling actor's target is considered the source of the damage, otherwise it is the calling actor itself. :*{{c|'''LAF_OVERRIDEZ'''}} — disregards the default calculations for the height at which the attack is fired, and instead fires it from the base of the actor, only taking ''offsetz'' into account. :*{{c|'''LAF_ABSOFFSET'''}} — the forward/side offset parameters will not be rotated by the ''angle'' value, instead aligning to the global X/Y axes (they will still be offsets from the actor's position, however). :*{{c|'''LAF_ABSPOSITION'''}} — the offset parameters will be treated like global map position, not relative to the actor's current position. {{clarification|Does this imply LAF_ABSOFFSET?}}<noinclude>
[[Category:Include templates]]</noinclude>
